articles.title: Sameer Verma gains big in BWF rankings after Slovenia Open win - SportsCafe
articles.description: After achieving his career-best ranking of world no.7 last week, HS Prannoy has fallen spots at world no. 9 this week. But he still remains the best-placed Indian in the men's singles, with Kidambi Srikanth and Lakshya Sen at 22nd and 23rd, respectively.
articles.content: Unfortunately, the decline of double Olympic medalist PV Sindhu continued, as she fell two places to world no. 13. Tanya Hemanth was the biggest gainer in the singles, as she rose four places to be r… [+170 chars]
